japanese: で、指示を出すのは――
translation: Alright, who will give directions%p-2;――%p;?

japanese:
私の指示通りにしてくれれば楽勝よ。
任せておきなさい。
translation:
If you follow my instructions, this'll be a snap.
Leave it to me.

japanese: 私、頑張るから。
translation: I'll do my best.

japanese:
（よりによって、この２人か。
　何もなきゃいいんだが……）
translation:
(Out of everyone here, these two.
 I hope nothing happens...)

japanese: フータロー君、目隠しするから動かないでね。
translation: Futaro-kun, don't move, okay? I'll put on the blindfold.

japanese:
準備はいいですか？
よーい……スタート！
translation:
Are you ready?
And... START!

japanese:
フータロー！
少し右に向いて進んで！
translation:
Futaro!
Turn right a little, and head straight.

japanese: そう、その向きであってるから！
translation: Yes, that's the correct direction!

japanese:
（三玖しか指示出ししてないのか？
　まあ、順調な分には問題ないか……）
translation:
(I wonder why only Miku is giving directions?
 Well, I guess it's okay if I'm doing well.)

japanese: ねえ、二乃はなんで指示出さないの？
translation: Hey, Nino, why aren't you giving instructions?

japanese: フー君！　もう少し右に向かって歩いて！
translation: Fu-kun! Go to the right a little more!

japanese:
えっ？
そっちは違う。
translation:
What?
That's not helping.

japanese:
そうそう、ちょうどいい感じよ！
そのまま真っ直ぐねー！　早く早く！
translation:
That's good, just like that!
Go straight from there! Hurry, hurry!

japanese:
（今度は二乃だけか？
　どうなってんだ……）
translation:
(Now it's just Nino giving directions?
 What's going on here...)

japanese:
あっ！
もしかしてフータローを自分のほうへ……！
translation:
Ah!
You seem to be guiding Futaro towards yourself...!

japanese:
フータロー！
そっちは違う！　もっと左に来て！
translation:
Futaro!
Don't go that way! Go more to the left!

japanese: はっ！？
translation: HUH?!

japanese:
やる気ね三玖。
でも、もう遅いわ。
translation:
You're impassioned, aren't you, Miku.
Yet, you're too late.

japanese: フー君！　そのまま早く早く！
translation: Fu-kun! Just like that, hurry, hurry!

japanese: フータロー、もっと左！　間違えないで！
translation: Futaro, to the left! Listen to me!

japanese:
そっちは違うわよ！
そのまま進めば大丈夫だから！
translation:
Don't go left!
Perfect! From there, just go straight!

japanese:
（どっちが違ってるのかわからん！
　あいつら、出してる指示が正反対じゃねーか！）
translation:
(I don't know who's right and who's wrong!
 They're telling me the exact opposite things!)

japanese:
あっ！？　左に行きすぎ！
こっち、こっちだってばー！
translation:
AH?! You went too far left!
Over here, over here, I say!

japanese:
ダメ、そっちに行っちゃイヤ！
フータロー！
translation:
No, don't go that way!
Futaro!

japanese:
（あー……これは、わかったぞ。
　あいつら自分のほうへ俺を誘導してるな。
　真面目にやる気がないなら少し驚かせてやる！）
translation:
(Ahh... I finally got it.
 They're guiding me towards them. If they don't
 wanna be serious, I'll surprise them a little!

japanese: フー君、もっと右だってばぁ！
translation: Fu-kun, more to the right, I say!

japanese: 左！　もっと左にきて！
translation: Left! Head more towards the left!

japanese: あ～、こっちかな？　それともこっちかー？
translation:
Aah, over here, maybe?
Or, perhaps over here?

japanese:
いいわよ、フー君！
あとちょっと、もうすぐゴールよ！
translation:
Oh good, Fu-kun!
Just a little more, you're almost at the goal!

japanese: ああっ、そっちに行っちゃダメ！
translation: Aaah, don't go that way!

japanese:
（２人の声がだいぶ近くなってきたな。
　そろそろか？）
translation:
(Their voices have gotten pretty close.
 It's almost time to strike.)

japanese:
そう、そこよ！
そこで振りかぶって！
translation:
PERFECT, right there!
Swing!

japanese:
ここでいいのかなー？
行くぞー、振り下ろすぞー？
translation:
Right here, huh?
Okay then, I'm gonna swing it down, okay?

japanese: えい！
translation: Yah!

japanese: うおぉ！？
translation: WOAH?!

japanese: 二乃！？　なにして……
translation: Nino?! What are you doing...

japanese: あはっ！　つーかまーえたっ！
translation: Aha! I CAUGHT you!

japanese:
なんだなんだ！？
何が起きてるんだ！？
translation:
WHAT THE HECK?!
What's happening?!

japanese:
もう、遅すぎよ。
待ちくたびれちゃったじゃない。
でも私のほうに来てくれるって信じてたんだからね？
translation:
You were too slow.
I got tired of waiting.
But, I knew you'd come for me.

japanese:
に、二乃！
危ないから離れてくれ！
translation:
N-Nino!
That was dangerous, get away from me!

japanese: やーだ！　もう離さないんだから。
translation: NO! I won't let go.

japanese:
二乃！
フータローが困ってるから離れて……！
translation:
Nino!
Futaro's having trouble, let him go...!

japanese: あ、ちょっと！？
translation: Aah, what the?!

japanese: 今のはさすがに、ちょっとやりすぎ。
translation: You went too far this time.

japanese:
なに言ってんのよ、
あんただって同じこと考えてたんでしょ？
おあいこじゃない。
translation:
What are you saying?
You were thinking the same thing, weren't you?
Now we're square.

japanese: くそ、捕まっちまった！
translation: Ah, dang, you caught me!

japanese:
（……と、まあ、
　少しくらい悪ふざけに乗ってやるか）
translation:
(...Well, I guess
 I'll just play along with her prank.)

japanese:
ふふっ！
捕まえたからには……もう私のものよね？
さあ、どうしようかしら。
translation:
Teehee!
Because I caught you...you're mine now, okay?
Now, what shall I do with you?

japanese: は？
translation: Wha?

japanese:
ねえフー君？
本当に私のものになってくれるのなら……
このまま抱きしめてくれない？
translation:
Hey, Fu-kun?
If you're really mine...
will you hold me, just like this?

japanese:
ち、違う！
フータローは誰のものでもないから！
二乃、離れて！
translation:
N-no!
Futaro belongs to no one!
Nino, get away!

japanese:
冗談よ、冗談。
そんなに必死になることないじゃない。
translation:
I'm joking, only joking.
Don't get so desperate, Miku.

japanese: むう……。
translation: Mmmhh...

japanese:
なんで抱きつく！？
危ないだろ、離れろ！
translation:
Why are you holding onto me?!
That was dangerous, let go!

japanese: やん！？
translation: NOOO?!

japanese:
驚かさないでくれ。
こっちは目隠しして棒まで持ってんだぞ？
translation:
Don't surprise me, like that, especially right now.
I'm blindfolded, and I'm holding a big stick, right?

japanese: 今のはさすがに、ちょっとやりすぎ。
translation: Now that was a little too far.

japanese:
三玖の言うとおりだ。
怪我したらイタズラじゃすまなかったぞ。
translation:
Miku's right.
If someone got hurt, that'd be pretty serious.

japanese:
ごめんね、フータロー。
騙すみたいなことしちゃって。
translation: Sorry, we tried to deceive you, Futaro.

japanese:
まあ、反省してるんならいい。
お前も怪我はないよな？
translation:
Well, if you're remorseful, that's fine, then.
You're not hurt, are you, Miku?

japanese:
えっ？
うん、大丈夫。
translation:
Huh?
Yes, I'm okay.

japanese: そうか、ならよかった。
translation: Good, that's great to hear.

japanese: ……ありがと。
translation: ...Thanks for checking.

japanese: それっと！
translation: HAI-YAH!

japanese: （やっと割れた……必要以上に疲れたな……）
translation:
(I finally split it...
 I'm way more tired than I should be...)

japanese: お疲れ様、フータロー。
translation: Good work, Futaro.

japanese:
お前ら、もし俺があそこで棒を振り下ろしてたら
どうするつもりだったんだ？
translation:
What would you have done
if I had swung the stick down back there?

japanese:
私は、フー君がそんなことするわけないって
信じてたもの。
translation:
I trusted that you wouldn't do that sort of thing,
Fu-kun.

japanese:
私もフータローなら気がついていると思ってた。
実際、途中で気がついてたよね。
translation:
I also thought you'd figure out
what was going on, Futaro...and you did!

japanese:
……なんで、お前らは
そこまで俺のことを信用できるんだよ。
translation: ...How can you guys trust me so much?

japanese:
えっ？
だってそれは……。
translation:
Huh?
Well, that's because...

japanese: フー君はなんでだと思う？
translation: Why do you think, Fu-kun?

japanese: （しまった、墓穴だった……）
translation: (Oh no, it was a trap...)
